thread.title: Gold Inches Lower After Wednesday Rally

author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Gold Inches Lower After Wednesday Rally
text:
Gold prices inched lower Thursday, pausing after the dollarâ€™s weakness propelled the precious metal to its best day since March a day earlier.
Front-month gold for February delivery closed down 0.3% at $1,352.10 a troy ounce. Prices are near their highest level since August 2016 and surged Wednesday after inflation data showed consumer prices rose more than expected in January.
Although...
